EmailTemplate.name: Common Deployment Components
EmailTemplate.subject: Important: Salesforce Copado Conflict Detection Automation Report - {!QuickText.Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team,

Copado automation has successfully detected potential conflicts on same file(s) across developers and environments ({!QuickText.Environment__c}) for {!QuickText.Release__c} release. Please find the detailed report below for today, {!QuickText.Date__c}.

{!QuickText.Datatable__c}

In case of any questions or further assistance please reach out to the Copado team.

Best regards,
Copado Team
